value.string:
This bot will do all crud operations in a excel sheet in first phase 
and it will be extended in future for multiple sheets.

It takes Excel Path, Sheet name, Key columns, 
Records and Operation Type as an Input and will do crud operations on it.

It will work on Operation type like
“INSERT”, ”UPDATE”, ”GET”, "ARCHIVE", "DELETE", "GET_TABLE_SCHEMA".

It will return Output SUCCESS if operation is successful 
else it will return errors message on error.
Author, Description and Change History Section
Open input Excel, Get data into Data Table and close Excel
Open Excel, Put the updated Data Table and close Excel
Open Excel, Put the updated Data Table and close Excel
Open Excel, Put the Inserted Data Table and close Excel
Open Excel, Delete the required Data Table and close Excel
Deleting all rows except first row,

value.expression: One empty row is required on $prompt-assignment$ sheet.

value.string: Assign Blank value to first record
One empty row is required on

variables.name: prompt-assignment
variables.description: A variable you can use for assignments

variables.name: strBotName
variables.description: Stores the Bot Name

variables.name: numErrorLineNumber
variables.description: Stores the Error Line Number from the Catch block

variables.name: strErrorMessage
variables.description: Stores the error message from catch block

variables.name: strConfigFilePath
variables.description: Stores the Config File Path

variables.name: strOperationType
variables.description: It will work on Operation type like “INSERT”, ”UPDATE”, ”GET”, "ARCHIVE", "DELETE", "GET_TABLE_SCHEMA".

variables.name: strExcelSession
variables.description: Stores the Excel Session

variables.name: dtExcelData
variables.description: Stores the Data Table from Excel for performing operation.

variables.name: numCounter
variables.description: Counter variable for use

variables.name: lstKeyList
variables.description: Stores the Input Key(One or more) in aList

variables.name: strKeyColumn
variables.description: Used in a loop for storing current key column.(or First key column)

variables.name: strKeyValue
variables.description: Used in a loop. Stores the value of current key column

variables.name: recEach
variables.description: Stores the Current Record in the loop

variables.name: strSearchKey
variables.description: Used to hold the key in the loop of dictionary

variables.name: strDelimeter
variables.description: Stores the Delimeter

variables.name: dtResult
variables.description: Returns records, searching on values in the dicInput. Key of the dictionary holds the column name. Value of the dictionary  may  holds more than one value separated by  some special character(|)

variables.name: IsRecordFind
variables.description: Used in case of GET Operation. Record is found or not.

variables.name: dtInputs
variables.description: It will be used for INSERT operation as an input. The Records exist in this table will be inserted to the excel. The schema of table “dtInputs” and excel should be same.

variables.name: lstRowIndexToDelete
variables.description: Used in case of Delete. It stores the Row index of excel which needs to be deleted.

variables.name: numRowIndex
variables.description: Stores the current Row Index to Delete

variables.name: dicTableSchema
variables.description: This will be used for operation type “GET_TABLE_SCHEMA”.  The sheet name will be kept in key and  schema of the record will be kept in value.

variables.name: dicBaseParams
variables.description: Keys are “EXCEL_PATH”,”SHEET_NAME”,”KEY_COLUMNS”, ”ARCHIVE_EXCEL_PATH”, ”ARCHIVE_SHEET_NAME”

variables.name: dicSearchParams
variables.description: The key holds column name, value holds the value in dictionary. This will be used for operation type  “GET”,”UPDATE”,”DELETE”,”ARCHIVE”   User to provide dtInputs or dicInputs , not both at one time.

variables.name: isSuccess
variables.description: If operation is successful then returns true else  false.
